bucket.shortDescription: How much you rely on your inner sense of knowing vs. external sources
bucket.fullDescription: The Bucket represents your decision-making style - whether you trust internal intuition or seek external validation. It reflects how you form and hold your truths.

bands.title: Cautious
bands.fullDesc: You strongly prioritize external validation and data. You seek extensive research, expert opinions, and consensus before making decisions. Your strength is thoroughness and evidence-based thinking.

bands.title: External-Leaning
bands.fullDesc: You primarily rely on external information but incorporate gut feelings when data is limited. You value research but can act on instinct when needed. Your strength is pragmatic analysis.

bands.title: Internal-Leaning
bands.fullDesc: You lead with intuition but validate important decisions with data. You trust your inner compass while remaining open to external input. Your strength is confident flexibility.

bands.title: Intuitive
bands.fullDesc: You rely heavily on your internal compass and instincts. You trust your gut feelings above external opinions and act with conviction. Your strength is decisive action and self-trust.

thickness.shortDescription: How easily you reassess what you know when contradictions appear
thickness.fullDescription: Thickness measures how firmly you hold your truths under pressure. It reflects your willingness to change core beliefs when presented with contradictory evidence.

bands.title: Flexible
bands.fullDesc: You readily update your beliefs when presented with new information. You hold truths lightly and adapt quickly. Your strength is openness and learning agility.

bands.title: Moderate
bands.fullDesc: You hold some truths firmly while remaining open to change on others. You reassess thoughtfully based on evidence strength. Your strength is discernment and stability.

bands.title: Persistent
bands.fullDesc: You maintain your core truths despite challenges. It takes significant evidence to change your fundamental beliefs. Your strength is consistency and reliability.

input.shortDescription: How much outside information you prefer before updating your bucket
input.fullDescription: The Input Pipe represents your learning style - how much information you gather before forming or changing opinions. It reflects your appetite for external perspectives.

bands.title: Quick Integration
bands.fullDesc: You learn by doing and prefer minimal external input. You trust experience over research and act quickly on limited information. Your strength is speed and self-reliance.

bands.title: Moderate Gathering
bands.fullDesc: You gather a reasonable amount of information before acting. You balance research with action, seeking input when valuable. Your strength is efficiency and practicality.

bands.title: Wide Research
bands.fullDesc: You extensively research and gather diverse perspectives before forming opinions. You value comprehensive understanding over quick action. Your strength is thoroughness and wisdom.

output.shortDescription: How strongly you feel the need to share what you know
output.fullDescription: The Output Pipe represents your communication style - how much you share your thoughts and knowledge with others. It reflects your drive to influence and teach.

bands.title: Internal
bands.fullDesc: You prefer to keep your thoughts and knowledge to yourself. You share selectively and value privacy over influence. Your strength is quiet wisdom and focused action.

bands.title: Selective
bands.fullDesc: You share thoughtfully based on context and audience. You balance expression with discretion, speaking when it adds value. Your strength is strategic communication.

bands.title: Broadcast
bands.fullDesc: You actively share your knowledge and perspectives. You're energized by teaching and influencing others through communication. Your strength is inspiration and leadership.

tree.shortDescription: What fundamentally drives you - from harmony to mastery to impact to discovery
tree.fullDescription: The Tree represents your core motivation - what you're fundamentally wired to seek. It ranges from Root (harmony/belonging) through Trunk (mastery/growth) and Branch (impact/legacy) to Leaf (novelty/discovery).

subtypes.name: Root-Leaf
subtypes.description: Bridges exploration with connection. You seek new experiences that bring people together.

subtypes.name: Root
subtypes.description: Deep connection to community and harmony. You are motivated by belonging and creating safety.

subtypes.name: Root-Trunk
subtypes.description: Balances connection with personal growth. You develop skills to better support others.

subtypes.name: Trunk
subtypes.description: Focused on mastery and self-improvement. You're driven by becoming more capable.

subtypes.name: Trunk-Branch
subtypes.description: Combines personal mastery with system impact. You develop expertise to create change.

subtypes.name: Branch
subtypes.description: Driven by impact and contribution. You focus on creating lasting change.

subtypes.name: Branch-Leaf
subtypes.description: Merges impact with exploration. You create change through innovation.

subtypes.name: Leaf
subtypes.description: Energized by novelty and discovery. You thrive on new experiences and variety.
